name: alcant-website
description: Alcant E-commerce Website - Node.js Application for Hostinger

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../admin-panel && npm run build
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "node server.js" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd admin-panel && npm run dev"

author: ClickAsia Web
